subject: Web3
title: Shipping and Logistics
description: A quick, practical guide to Shipping and Logistics.

hook.text: A single shipping container can involve 30 organizations and 200 documents. Blockchain aims to simplify that.

buildup.text: Maersk and IBM built TradeLens to digitize shipping documents on a shared blockchain ledger.

discovery.text: Customs forms, bills of lading, and port records were all shared in real time across the supply chain.

twist.text: TradeLens shut down in 2022. Competing shipping companies refused to join a platform controlled by Maersk.

climax.text: The technology worked but the politics didn't. Blockchain can't force competitors to cooperate.

punchline.text: The blockchain worked perfectly. Getting rivals to share it didn't.

quiz.question: Why did Maersk's TradeLens blockchain shut down?
options: Competing companies refused to join a Maersk-controlled platform
